SEARCH
Module help
Package help

Class Step5Controller

java.lang.Object
help.Step5Controller
public class Step5Controller extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling the actions of Step 5 in the cashier multi-step process.

  • Method Details

    • handleCloseButtonAction

      private void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the close button is clicked. Closes the current stage (window).
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggers this method.

    • handleMinimizeButtonAction

      private void handleMinimizeButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the minimize button is clicked. Minimizes the current stage (window).
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggers this method.

    • handleSignOutButtonAction

      private void handleSignOutButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action when the sign-out button is clicked. Performs sign-out by returning products to the inventory, deleting the ticket, clearing the shopping cart, and navigating back to the login screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggers this method.

    • initialize

      private void initialize() throws Exception
      Initializes the UI with details of the selected shopping cart, movie, session, and customer. Displays relevant information such as movie name, session details, customer name, seat numbers, and items in the shopping cart.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during initialization

    • handleNextButtonAction

      private void handleNextButtonAction() throws IOException
      Handles the action for the "Next" button, which navigates to the final step.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while loading the next step

    • handleBackButtonAction

      private void handleBackButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the action for the "Back" button, which navigates back to the previous step and returns the products to stock, deletes the ticket, and clears the shopping cart.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the "Back" button
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the process

    • savePDFToDatabase

      private void savePDFToDatabase(String filepath, int ticketId, String format) throws Exception
      Saves the PDF of the invoice to the database.
      Parameters:
      filepath - the path to the PDF file
      ticketId - the ticket ID associated with the invoice
      format - the format of the invoice
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while reading the PDF file or saving to the database

    • handleSaveTicketInvoice

      private void handleSaveTicketInvoice(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action for saving the ticket and invoice as PDF files. It updates the bank totals, creates the PDFs for the ticket and invoice, saves them to the user's Documents folder, and uploads them to the database.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking the save button

    • createTicketPDF

      private void createTicketPDF(String filepath, Tickets ticket, ShoppingCart cart) throws IOException
      Creates a PDF document for the movie ticket with the given ticket details and shopping cart information.
      Parameters:
      filepath - the file path where the ticket PDF will be saved
      ticket - the ticket object containing the ticket details
      cart - the shopping cart object containing the selected movie and seats
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while creating or saving the PDF

    • createInvoicePDF

      private void createInvoicePDF(String filepath, Tickets ticket, ShoppingCart cart) throws IOException
      Creates a PDF document for the invoice with the given ticket details and shopping cart information.
      Parameters:
      filepath - the file path where the invoice PDF will be saved
      ticket - the ticket object containing the ticket details
      cart - the shopping cart object containing the selected products and prices
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while creating or saving the PDF

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String header, String content, javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType type)
      Displays an alert to the user with the specified title, header, content, and alert type.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert
      header - the header of the alert
      content - the content of the alert
      type - the type of the alert (e.g., information, error)
